Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17698251]Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus ATCC4698 (MIC=39 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus KCTC3881 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis ATCC6633 (MIC=60 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC12228 (MIC=60 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Shigella dysenteriae ATCC9752 (MIC=15 µg/ml), Escherichia coli KCTC2433 (MIC=15 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC10031 (MIC>100 µg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC36232 (MIC=100 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:17698251] It has 1.86% hemolytic activity at 100 μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Dybowskin-3 has hemolytic activity against human red blood cells (hRBCs).

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretion of Rana dybowskii.
Literature.Author: Kim SS, Shim MS, Chung J, Lim DY, Lee BJ.

Literature.Title: Cytolytic peptides belonging to the brevinin-1 and brevinin-2 families isolated from the skin of the Japanese brown frog, Rana dybowskii.
